Text: Re Calp Payments Cc The deal with CES was that the invoice would be paid upon receipt It was never CALPs intent to fund the OPT payment As requested I will faxed Februarys bill to Robin Since the January payment is so late could you have January and Februarys payments wire transferred to CALPs account Thanks Paulette on PM To Roman ME Paulette ME cc Subject Calp Payments Roman and Paulette Sorry for the delay Januarys check will be sent out tomorrow Friday March th As soon as Mark Feldman Enron payment God receives Februarys bill he can pay this one too Thank you for your patience during this transition
